Html:
Hi, I am trying to build QuickGraph from sources but its impossible because no Microsoft.Pex.Framework.

Where can I find it?

How I can build without this assebmly?

Thank you.
Regards.

Pex is required to build the QuickGraph tests. Unfortunately, it is not public yet so I cannot check it in. If you unload the test project, the solution should build just fine.

More info about Pex can be found at http://research.microsoft.com/pex .
